version.description: Polyglot semantic versioning with conventional commits support for any project type

changelog.description: Polyglot CHANGELOG.md generation from conventional commits for any project type

publish.description: Polyglot package publishing to npm, Nexus, or custom registries for any project type

validate.description: Validate and display nx-project-release configuration summary

release.description: Handle git operations (commit, tag, push) and create GitHub/GitLab releases

artifact.description: Create distributable artifact (zip, tar, tgz) from build output
